document_data.name: Stationers' Hall
document_data.location: The [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Stationers' Hall''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] of the [[Stationers' Guild|same name]].<ref>
document_data.Location: Stationers' Hall was located along the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Services: [[Parchment]] was produced within this building. It was supplied to members of the Stationers' Guild, along with other products of their trade, at a discounted price.
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls, Stationers' Hall was considered by locals to be a landmark.
document_data.History: [[Jalaerho Kloskurmrundur]] was the Guildmaster Emeritus of the guild in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1378}}, Jalaerho published a [[book]] called ''[[A Seat That Draws Blood: Ten Years a Guildmaster]]'', recording a decade of his career and personal musings.
